notes: Alps Alpine - Car electronics, B2B partner APIs only
Hyundai - Connected car services are dealer/B2B restricted
Acer - Partner programs for gaming/enterprise only
Haier - Smart home APIs are B2B restricted
Didi - Partner APIs only, no public developer portal
Meituan - Chinese platform, no English developer portal
Coupang Korea - Partner APIs only, no public access
IHG - Partner APIs through GDS/connectivity providers
Wyndham has developer portals for franchise operations, APIs available through partnerships only.
Skyworth Group offers smart home IoT SDK for enterprise partners through business agreements, but no publicly accessible developer portal.
Yamaha MusicCast - API exists but no official public developer portal, community docs only
